name: twotonturkey
text: They should have done this in Withnail & I.

name: wolfsleepy
text: How can we make it die?

name: invidious
text: I'm almost 100% positive this is how Gordon Ramsey prepares Coq au vin.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Good call! When I first saw that movie, I sort of expected them to wimp out and make friends with it or something. I'm glad they found a way to destroy its itty bitty soul instead.

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: Actually, I was watching that movie agai recently and when the chicken scene came up I was expecting them to shout at it.  Then I remembered, no, that's Roastbeef.

name: comrade_tom
text:
Same here.

Withnail had far more class than to tell a chicken "it sucked" before despatching it.

Incidentally i can imagine liebot yelling "scrubbers" out fo a car window.

name: smallberries
text:
This topic is exactly why I dig Achewood message boards, exemplified.

I can see Lyle ranting "I demand to have some booze!" and vomiting lighter fluid.

name: soticoto
text:
Wait a sec... is that who I think it is in your pic?
Could by just my imagination.

name: shogun
text: They should have done this on Good Eats.

name: twotonturkey
text: I don't think Alton Brown is raw enough to pull that off.

name: snoozebar
text:
"YOU...ARE...A...UNITASKER!"

Yeah, doesn't work.

name: stopeatingmyeyes
text:
oh my god oh my god oh my god

spot on, my friend

name: shogun
text:
Just saying, the Cuckoo for Coq au Vin had this exact same premise. Gasp! This chicken is ALIVE! Now what!

It's been done.

name: joeyramoney
text: alton brown is raw enough to pull anything off. he made cake icing with avocados, fer christs' sake.

name: tellumo
text: Alton Brown's freezer operates at minus-twenty-seven degrees. Kelvin.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Hilarious!

name: wutangtan
text: Every Burger King Alton Brown has walked into has immediately closed forever -- try as they might, they simply can't 'do it his way'.

name: pwb
text: no way man, Alton is hell of raw

name: saucy_jack
text: This strip makes me temporarily regret switching from a Withnail & I avatar to Vlad.

name: speth
text: yeah i agree

name: deimosrising
text: Honestly if this worked it would seem less humane to me, not more.

name: scion
text: Perhaps he's goading the chicken into a cat-on-bird no-holds-barred hand-to-hand fight to the death? A solution with honor for the winner and the loser.

name: jhunter
text: Chickens don't have hands, though. I think Beef should impose some kind of handicap upon himself to keep things sporting.

name: magb
text: Angry Roast Beef always gets me.

name: chaos
text: what the hell roast beef that was rude

name: alejandroadam
text: I love the panel where he musters what he needs for yelling a itty bitty soul to death

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Chicken' all actin' defiant in the last panel.

name: the_doz
text: bruk

name: mockereo
text: i took that bruk as a death gasp as that tinly little heart stopped

name: lizjones
text: I dunno, that looks like another rooster to me. Beef's gonna straight-up roast another ding dong.

name: someone3
text:
coq au vin
is a rooster that is tenderized in red wine, i take forever to make, but apperently you have to emotionally tenderize it first.

name: sexualhomeboy
text: "coq au vin" is french or something for "cock in wine", so that would be the point, yes.

name: gormster
text: delicious, delicious cock.

name: maldraedior
text: a chubby for your delicious cock

name: soticoto
text: A veritable sausage-fest.

name: cuddlefish
text: bahahahaha classic beef

name: katsura
text:
This is easily one of my favorite strips ever.

WHO YOU GOIN' 'BRUK' AT

name: nurdbot
text: Free range chickens are hardcore to kill.

name: jamers
text: They can easily take out an eye with a well aimed peck.

name: achewoodno1fan
text: lol this is like how i get when im angry/pissed off- SThu you SUCK SO MUCH

name: djwhiterabbit
text: if beef ain't careful, he's gonna get put in the newspaper for yellin' so loud that he had to go to the hospital.

name: featurelessvoid
text: This only works if the chicken is from Circumstances.  Otherwise, chickens have mad self-esteem.

name: byronic
text: After seeing this strip, I tried this at my cousin's farm.  It doesn't work.  And his wife thinks I'm a total idiot as I tried to explain why I was yelling at her livestock.

name: killerlimpet
text: I just tried it with some roaches that are invading my kitchen. Didn't work with them either, and my girlfriend thinks I'm "a special boy."

name: thisdoggisproice
text: Animals killed with mean words have the faint taste of tears, though luckily, this is a taste to which Roast Beef is well accustomed.

name: charchar
text: you can't even fly.

name: cousinted
text: You should pour boiling hot gravy in its eyes!

name: agentstinky
text:
OK hot soup is on my eyes.

Oh no now you're doing a hip hop dance on my head.

name: jesler729
text: Beef kind of loses it here.

name: honesttom
text: "YOU WERE BORN TO DIE AND OVULATE!"

name: mugi
text: In that order?

name: missbee
text: dude, cocks don't ovulate!

name: i_love_kate
text: Shit! Someone get me to a doctor?

name: norrin
text:
I think if you want to kill a chicken by yelling at it, you shouldn't try to be mean, you should try shocking it.

"The mailman is sleeping with your wife!"

text: Sad thing is that this was prolly what was yelled at Roast Beef when he was young :<

text: Oh my dogg

text: That "bruk" gets me EVERY time. Goddamn chicken.

text: I'LL BE AT DUANE'S!

text: Beef shouldn't have yelled at him. That was uncalled for.

text: it seems to me that roast beef is kind of yelling at himself at the end of the strip, and i know the chicken knows this.

name: hellofditties
text: Food chain, Roast Beef.  Get used to it.

name: missbee
text: you should never be a cock to a cock

name: fallow_fields
text: five! no, ten!

name: pan-optic
text:
the transition in the bottom row from confused arched eyebrows to guilty handwringing to pure insane anger, along with the shocked expression on the rooster's face, makes this comic
straight
up
excellent

name: chloraloner
text: Shock didn't stop the rooster from sassing back at the end.

text: to answer the alt text with a horrid nerd joke that deserves to be lamed out of existence, power word: kill

text: WHAT THE HELL IS THE MATTER WITH YOU CHICKENS

text:
Why did you you think of that though
Why would you think of that

And wait...a blarghamagarky post marked as new?

This day is already confusing me. Too early, too early.

name: tonyhighwind
text:
This is the only way a depressed cat can even think of killing a chicken, a chicken that was probably bred with a short lifespan and marginal escape abilities as desired traits.

GOLD.

name: beverage
text: If I had to choose one strip, this would be high in the running.

text: Reminds me of the video with the guy yelling at his cats.

text: This was my first strip!
